title: File Watchdog

detailed_design.description: Service that monitors configurable directories (e.g. ~/Downloads, ~/Projects) for new/changed files; emits events (path, event type) for downstream Content Classifier or Event Bus. Options: polling, or inotify/watchdog (Python watchdog). Config: list of paths and optionally patterns.
detailed_design.solution: 1. Add config for watch paths and optional patterns. 2. Use Python watchdog or polling to detect create/change events. 3. Emit events (path, event_type) for downstream consumers. 4. Minimal performance impact; document config.

acceptance_criteria: Events on file create and change

user_stories.story: As a user, I want the system to detect new files in my Downloads so they can be classified.

technical_notes.current_issue: No file watch capability for Sentinel
dependencies: PBI-022 (Sentinel Review Queue UI) can stub events for UI work until this is done
